.. _tutorials:

Tutorials
=========

try ``pytraj`` online:

.. image:: http://mybinder.org/badge.svg
   :target: http://mybinder.org/repo/hainm/notebook-pytraj

|

If you miss any Python package, try using `conda install package_name`::

     conda install seaborn
